name: Aligator
short: A new friend to follow you around
description: Aligators can grow up to 46 feet in length, but they always start out as babies fresh from the egg. Our aligators are farm-raised and have been genetically enhanced to eat only grass and burglars - perfect for the whole family!

name: Computer
description: Conventionally, a computer consists of at least one processing element, typically a central processing unit (CPU), and some form of memory. Since a sequence of operations can be readily changed, the computer can solve more than one kind of problem.

name: Gummy Worms
description: These gummy worms are the best gummy worms you'll ever taste. Try some today...we dare you!

name: Venus Fly Trap
short: A fun plant for the kids
description: Sick of trying to swat flies? Buy this venus fly trap, it will do all of the swatting for you, and it also eats roast beef in the winter.

name: Rhinocerous
description: Love dogs? Forget about it! Rhinocerous' are the new hottest pets and make dogs look like wimps.

name: Seasoned Steak
description: Our pride and joy, this steak will leave your mouth watering for more. You'll eat so much, in fact, we only let you buy 5 at a time.
